Ugliest UI Rehab

This simple site is automatically deployed with GitHub Pages whenever I push to the repo. Below is a recreation of the worst interface I have ever used, plus a short checklist of improvements I would make.

The Offending Interface

Quick Fix Plan

  • Limit the color palette to one accent color and add breathing room.
  • Put the primary action first, keep help text nearby, and remove pop-ups.
  • Add semantic HTML, readable fonts, and keyboard-friendly controls.

I would also add a short onboarding message, explain how data is stored, and confirm success with a friendly, non-intrusive banner.

This project ships through a GitHub Actions workflow that lints, bundles, and deploys the page.

Repo link: https://github.com/KyleNGT/Module12_SEN10
